Readiness Indicators.content_preview:

Pending Contributions.content_preview:
Show each pending contribution with:
- Trigger type (sprint/milestone/deployment/project)
- Time until prompt ("Ready in X minutes" or "Scheduled")
- ...

Contribution History.content_preview:
- Contribution ID (format: CLN-YYYY-MMDD-XXXX)
- Type of contribution
- Date submitted
- Impact rating (1-5 stars based on community value)

Current Learnings.content_preview:
Group by category:
- Technical Patterns
- Team Insights  
- Performance Improvements
- Tool Effectiveness
- Architecture Decisions
- Process Improveme...

Skip History.content_preview:
Only show if skips exist:
- Date of skip
- Reason provided
- Frequency (if multiple)
